cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Hosted by Kentico partner Truelime, the Kentico User Group Benelux will be in North Brabant, Netherlands on Thursday March 21st to talk all things Kentico! This meetup will feature discussions about creating a great UX with DXPs, the Xperience by Kentico roadmap, and some AI insights.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Kentico User Group Benelux - 2024 March Meetup
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"fa45d960-c156-4043-addd-33393556db77","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"dd4d4791-97fe-4666-9eda-e9289be03efa","widgets":[{"identifier":"3193aadb-93ab-4d3a-bb05-c9007026f566","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"47c5e6d3-9a6f-4f5d-b93f-bfea88624f83","properties":{"markdown":"Join your fellow Kentico experts, enthusiasts, or anyone who wants to learn about Kentico in North Brabant, NL on Thursday, March 21st at the offices of [Kentico's partner TrueLime](https://www.kentico.com/partners/truelime).
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"52e7aae3-15c7-4ab7-b247-84100da57b69"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"49cd19da-cb8d-427a-b768-bb57111b0c1f","markdownStyle":"612a8a78-f9cf-42ff-96fb-306faef677d2","markdownStyleParsed":"1ea82111-c091-4b0b-bd3b-203de7b1ab75","markdownCodeLanguage":"b0063269-35e1-42a4-a400-eb6e741c1333","id":"f9f626ce-ffe8-4ddd-b6ab-7033e6fc6b3f"}}]},{"identifier":"4f386762-19d8-4af3-bb8a-8327860c3eba","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"133da588-641c-4cad-b920-364e5dc737bb","properties":{"markdown":"Date: 2024/3/21

Time: 17:30 - 22:00 CET

Location: Hoge Mosten 8/10, Breda, North Brabant, NL, 4822 NH
","markdownStyle":"Note","markdownStyleParsed":1,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"73591666-458d-4db2-84b9-fb0478306a9e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"d50aaa8c-07e5-4014-88e2-8082f3eaed09","markdownStyle":"5bab84fe-4583-4994-8a01-03c88d76a919","markdownStyleParsed":"6fda9e84-0a1f-4da9-81be-3b51038fedda","markdownCodeLanguage":"012cb577-6292-459e-92e6-0ded6239b7b2","id":"6eca7a76-5bc1-4469-86db-3fc2770138fc"}}]},{"identifier":"cb3eb613-045a-4f0f-96e3-b50d4e23a097","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0c8c5d6c-e22e-4706-86d4-7b172e3ebce0","properties":{"markdown":"March's meetup will feature several presenters, covering a variety of topics:

* **Jeroen Wehkamp**, UX & Design Guru, [Aviva Solutions](https://www.avivasolutions.nl/)

 Topic: How to create the best user experience with a dxp

 Description: Loads of businesses choose a digital experience platform to improve their user experiences. However, leveraging your DXP capabilities to actually support your user experience can be a challenge. Jeroen will walk you this process and share some of his UX insights.

* **Rodger Blom**, AI Engineer, [Truelime](https://www.truelime.nl/)

 Topic: AI

* **Filip de Cock**, Partner manager, [Kentico](https://www.kentico.com/partners)

 Topic: Xperience by Kentico roadmap

 Description: Filip will take you through the details of the [Xperience by Kentico roadmap](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released) and bring you up to speed with the latest news.

Register for the event and see [all the details on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/events/kenticousergroupmeeting7163454559565135873/comments/).

If you would like to see a Kentico user group start in your area, [let us know](https://community.kentico.com/#gridsection-feedback).
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"ebb98f5e-cb9a-497a-a107-6a4cb1bf55b9"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"098142f8-b829-4f12-a1f3-f517061d04a2","markdownStyle":"fa7adbdd-5bec-409c-b632-f8d70bd983e1","markdownStyleParsed":"4288ddc4-c0d7-4eb4-b6d7-f3c837d8a8bb","markdownCodeLanguage":"69c99b71-3845-4d4e-bbc2-8744679d9646","id":"e92874c0-fd9a-4791-865a-656d11729a09"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"ce8d0f8c-1d2f-435b-9055-1cd1afe94256","layoutParsed":"ce11f382-d6bc-4923-aa64-e1a3bb26d60f","paddingTop":"4a2ba03d-01f2-4287-9a2f-a9f062404c79","paddingTopParsed":"4921dd32-bf81-4730-becf-58a481822077","paddingBottom":"2da1f163-917e-4ca9-976a-9bf022b5207b","paddingBottomParsed":"75913c4e-515c-49df-a83e-3b71cdf12979","backgroundColor":"4ab7c38e-fa3f-46b8-8349-223d1934e804","backgroundColorParsed":"ef3955c7-60b0-449d-9bd2-a9428f303e39"}}]}]}
